Don ’ t forget to subscribe for more exclusive interviews and photos, only in EW. Hayley Mills had no idea she ’ d won an Oscar until it arrived on her doorstep. At 14, the actress nabbed the Academy ’ s last juvenile award — a special prize, first given in 1935, for child performers like Shirley Temple and Judy Garland — for her turn as the perpetually sunny heroine of Pollyanna.
